titles.title: Trauma Support and Mental Health in Schools Reauthorization Act of 2023
Trauma Support and Mental Health in Schools Reauthorization Act of 2023
To amend the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act to reauthorize grants to improve trauma support services and mental health care for children and youth in educational settings.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Trauma Support and Mental Health in Schools Reauthorization Act of 2023
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 grants for increasing student access to evidence-based trauma support services and mental health care.
